Kathleen Harriman, PhD, MPH, RN Vaccine Preventable Disease Epidemiology Section California Department of Public Health Immunization Branch

page.title:
Which employees are covered by the ATD standard?
Which employees are covered
by the ATD standard?
page.normal_text:
• Employees whose exposure from work activity or working conditions is reasonably anticipated to create an elevated risk of contracting any disease caused by aerosol-transmissible pathogens if protective measures are not in place

page.title:
Where do U.S. immunization recommendations come from?
Where do U.S. immunization
recommendations come from?
page.normal_text:
Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices (ACIP)
Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices (ACIP)

page.title:
ACIP Recommended Immunizations for U.S. HCP
ACIP Recommended
Immunizations for U.S. HCP
page.enlisting:
• All HCP who are not vaccinated: ▪ Tdap (tetanus, diphtheria, and acelluar pertussis) ▪ Hepatitis B vaccine ▪ Influenza vaccine • All HCP who are not immune: ▪ MMR (measles, mumps, and rubella) vaccine ▪ Varicella vaccine (two doses) • All HCP who are not vaccinated:
